Function to recode exclusive breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Source: R/04-recode_iycf.R
recode_ebf.Rd

Function to recode exclusive breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_ebf(df)

Arguments

df

A data.frame collected for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Study containing IYCF/breastfeeding data

Value

A vector of recoded exclusive breastfeeding status

Examples

iycfDF <- create_iycf(df = iycf, x = hh, y = hhMembers)
recode_ebf(df = iycfDF)
